mapper.insert: insert into CRM_ORDER_GSZC_DETAIL (EVENT_ID, ORDER_ID, ABSENT, REG_LOCATION_TYPE) values (#{eventId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{absent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regLocationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select EVENT_ID, ORDER_ID, ABSENT, REG_LOCATION_TYPE from CRM_ORDER_GSZC_DETAIL
